panels.description: Note that this table shows the average values for the entire period selected in the dashboard. Consequently, it may contain information about Pods or namespaces that were changed or deleted during the selected period.

targets.expr: kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}
max by (pod, node) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]))

sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_mode="Off"}[$__range]))) * 0
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_mode="Initial"}[$__range]))) * 0 + 1
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_mode="Auto"}[$__range]))) * 0 + 2
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]) * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_left() sum by (controller_type, controller_name) (avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", update_mode="Recreate"}[$__range]))) * 0 + 3
or
sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range])) * 0 + 5

sum by (container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
or
sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]) * 0)

sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
or
sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]) * 0)

sum by (container) (
  sum by (controller_type, controller_name, pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]))
  * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_right() 
  sum by (controller_type, controller_name, container) (
    avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", resource="cpu"}[$__range])))
or
sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
  -
  sum by (container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
) > 0
or
sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  (
    sum by (container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
    -
    sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
  ) or sum by (container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
) > 0
or
sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  (
    sum by (container) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range])) 
    / 
    sum by (container) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
  )
  * sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",unit="core",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
)
or
sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]) * 0)

sum by (container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
or
sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]) * 0)

sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
or
sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]) * 0)

sum by (container) (
  sum by (controller_type, controller_name, pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]))
  * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_right() 
  sum by (controller_type, controller_name, container) (
    avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", resource="memory"}[$__range])))
or
sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
  -
  sum by (container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
) > 0
or
sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  (
    sum by (container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
    -
    sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
  ) or sum by (container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
) > 0
or
sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]) * 0)

(
  # Show data rate for the Pod if it had hostNetwork: false during the selected period.
  max_over_time(kube_pod_info{host_network="false", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range])
  * on(pod)
  sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]))
) or (
  # Else return -1 if the Pod had hostNetwork: true during the selecte period.
  max_over_time(kube_pod_info{host_network="true", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]) * -1
)

(
  # Show data rate for the Pod if it had hostNetwork: false during the selected period.
  max_over_time(kube_pod_info{host_network="false", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range])
  * on(pod)
  sum by (pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]))
) or (
  # Else return -1 if the Pod had hostNetwork: true during the selecte period.
  max_over_time(kube_pod_info{host_network="true", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]) * -1
)
sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
sum by (container) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__range]))
sum by (container) (label_replace(increase(klog_pod_oomkill{namespace="$namespace", pod_name="$pod"}[$__range]), "container", "$1", "container_name", "(.+)"))

sum by (container) (avg_over_time(container_memory:kmem{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
or
sum by (container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]) * 0)

panels.title: Containers

targets.expr:
min by (container) (
  ((min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) == 1) * 0) or
  ((min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_running{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) == 1) * 1) or
  (
    (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_terminated_reason{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) == 1)
    * on(reason) group_left()
    (
      label_replace(vector(2), "reason", "Error", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(3), "reason", "Completed", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(4), "reason", "ContainerCannotRun", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(5), "reason", "OOMKilled", "", "")
    )
  ) or
  (
    (max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_waiting_reason{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]) == 1)
    * on(reason) group_left()
    (
      label_replace(vector(6), "reason", "ContainerCreating", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(7), "reason", "CrashLoopBackOff", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(8), "reason", "CreateContainerConfigError", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(9), "reason", "ErrImagePull", "", "") or
      label_replace(vector(10), "reason", "ImagePullBackOff", "", "")
    )
  )
)
sum by (container) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: The number of container OOM kills

targets.expr: sum by (container) (increase(oom_kills:normalized{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (increase(oom_kills:normalized{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: OOM Killed Processes

targets.expr: sum by(container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: The total value may not equal the sum of system and user times because of the kernel's cgroup accounting peculiarities. Read more here: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/cpuacct.txt

targets.expr: sum by(pod) (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Usage by state

panels.description: This graph shows the requested CPU resources higher than the actual CPU consumption. In other words, it shows CPU resources that can be "freed" without affecting the service.

targets.expr:
sum by (namespace, pod, container)
  (
    (
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
      -
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
    ) > 0
  )

sum
  (
    (
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
      -
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="POD", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
    ) > 0
  )

panels.title: Over-requested by container

panels.description: This graph shows the requested CPU resources lower than the actual CPU consumption. In other words, it shows CPU resources that need to be "reserved" for the service to run smoothly.
panels.title: Under-requested by container

panels.description: The absence of data on the graph means that container resources are not set

targets.expr: (sum by (pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (container, pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))) * sum by (pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",unit="core",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"})

sum by (pod) ((sum by (pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (container, pod) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))) * sum by (pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",unit="core",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}))

panels.title: Throttling

panels.description: The total value may not equal the sum of system and user times because of the kernel's cgroup accounting peculiarities. Read more here: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/cpuacct.txt

targets.expr: sum by(container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD", container="$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container="$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",unit="core",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container="$container"}[$__rate_interval]) )

sum by (container) (
  sum by (controller_type, controller_name, pod) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"})
  * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_right() 
  sum by (controller_type, controller_name, container) (
    avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", resource="cpu"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
)

panels.title: $container

panels.description: The total value may not equal the sum of system and user times because of the kernel's cgroup accounting peculiarities. Read more here: https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/cpuacct.txt

targets.expr: sum by(container) (rate(container_cpu_system_seconds_total{container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace", container="$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container) (rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace", container="$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace", container="$container"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: $container

targets.expr: sum by(container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: The Working set bytes metric is the actual memory used by the container, as it includes active file memory. When its value approaches the limit, the container can be killed by the OOMKiller. This value can be higher than the sum RSS and Cache since not all active file memory is Cache.

targets.expr: sum by(pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory_rss{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory_cache{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory_swap{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(pod) (avg_over_time(container_memory:kmem{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Usage by state

panels.description: This graph shows the requested Memory resources higher than the actual Memory consumption. In other words, it shows Memory resources that can be "freed" without affecting the service.

targets.expr:
sum by (container)
  (
    (
      sum by (namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
      -
      sum by (namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
    ) > 0
  )

sum
  (
    (
      sum by (namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
      -
      sum by (namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"}[$__rate_interval]))
    ) > 0
  )

panels.title: Over-requested by container

panels.description: This graph shows the requested Memory resources higher than the actual Memory consumption. In other words, it shows Memory resources that need to be "reserved" for the service to run smoothly.
panels.title: Under-requested by container

panels.description: The Working set bytes metric is the actual memory used by the container, as it includes active file memory. When its value approaches the limit, the container can be killed by the OOMKiller. This value can be higher than the sum RSS and Cache since not all active file memory is Cache.

targets.expr: sum by(container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_rss{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD", container="$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_cache{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD", container="$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_swap{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD", container="$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD", container="$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory",unit="byte",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD", container="$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD", container="$container"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (container) (
  sum by (controller_type, controller_name, pod) (kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"})
  * on (controller_type, controller_name) group_right() 
  sum by (controller_type, controller_name, container) (
    avg_over_time(vpa_target_recommendation{namespace="$namespace", container=~"$container", resource="memory"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
)
sum by(container) (avg_over_time(container_memory:kmem{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="POD", container="$container"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: $container

panels.description: This graph shows Network Receive (except for the hostNetwork Pods)

-1.text: Network graph for Pod with hostNetwork: true is meaningless

targets.expr:
# Select Pods with hostNetwork: false.
kube_pod_info{host_network="false",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}
* on(pod)
# Sum data rate for all interfaces in the Pod.
sum by(pod) (rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))

# Return -1 for Pods with 'hostNetwork: true' to use in value mappings.
kube_pod_info{host_network="true",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}
*
-1

panels.title: Receive

panels.description: This graph shows Network Transmit (except for the hostNetwork Pods)

-1.text: no traffic available for hostNetwork: true

targets.expr:
# Select Pods with hostNetwork: false.
kube_pod_info{host_network="false",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}
* on(pod)
# Sum data rate for all interfaces in the Pod.
sum by(pod) (rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))

# Return -1 for Pods with 'hostNetwork: true' to use in value mappings.
kube_pod_info{host_network="true",namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}
*
-1

panels.title: Transmit

targets.expr: sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (rate(container_fs_reads_total{container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum (rate(container_fs_writes_total{container!="POD", pod="$pod", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: This graph does not show any localstorage-related information due to incorrectly calculating the occupied space on localstorage disks

targets.expr:
avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
* 
on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left (pod) 
(
  avg_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval])
  * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right(pod) 
  max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    label_replace(
      max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
      "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
    + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0))
  * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right (pod)
  avg_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", phase="Bound"}[$__rate_interval])
)

sum (
  avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  * 
  on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left (pod) 
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval])
    * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right(pod) 
    max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
      label_replace(
        max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
        "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
      + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0))
    * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right (pod)
    avg_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", phase="Bound"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
)

panels.title: PVC Provisioned (except local storage classes)

panels.description: This graph does not show any localstorage-related information due to incorrectly calculating the occupied space on localstorage disks

targets.expr:
(avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]) - avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
* 
on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left (pod) 
(
  avg_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval])
  * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right(pod) 
  max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    label_replace(
      max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
      "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
    + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0))
  * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right (pod)
  avg_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", phase="Bound"}[$__rate_interval])
)

sum (
  (avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]) - avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
  * 
  on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left (pod) 
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval])
    * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right(pod) 
    max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
      label_replace(
        max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
        "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
      + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0))
    * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right (pod)
    avg_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", phase="Bound"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
)

panels.title: PVC Usage (except local storage classes)

panels.description: This graph does not show any localstorage-related information due to incorrectly calculating the occupied space on localstorage disks

targets.expr:
(avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]) - avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
* 
on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left (pod) 
(
  avg_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval])
  * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right(pod) 
  max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
    label_replace(
      max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
      "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
    + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0))
  * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right (pod)
  avg_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", phase="Bound"}[$__rate_interval])
)
/
(
  avg_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  * 
  on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_left (pod) 
  (
    avg_over_time(kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval])
    * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right(pod) 
    max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
      label_replace(
        max_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
        "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
      + on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0))
    * on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) group_right (pod)
    avg_over_time(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_status_phase{namespace="$namespace", phase="Bound"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
)

panels.title: PVC Usage in % (except local storage classes)

targets.expr:
max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim, storageclass) (
  label_replace(
    kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"},
    "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)") 
  * on (persistentvolume) group_left() 
  kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes
) 
and on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) 
max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
  kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}
)

panels.description: This graph does not show any localstorage-related information due to incorrectly calculating the occupied space on localstorage disks

targets.expr:
max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim, storageclass) (
  label_replace(
    kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace="$namespace"},
    "persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)") 
  * on (persistentvolume) group_left() 
  avg_over_time(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes[$__rate_interval])
) 
and on (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) 
max by (namespace, persistentvolumeclaim) (
  kube_pod_spec_volumes_persistentvolumeclaims_info{namespace="$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim="$persistentvolumeclaim", pod=~"$pod"}
)

panels.title: $persistentvolumeclaim
